Main content starts here, tab to start navigating Edmund's Original The Bower Slide 1 of 2 Slide 2 of 2 hero gallery paused, press to play images slides Playing hero gallery, press to pause images slides Hours & Location 1081 Morrison Dr., Charleston, SC 29403 1 (843) 727-1145 edmundsoriginal@theindigoroad.com Outdoor Hours: Monday - Friday: 3 p.m. - 10 p.m.Saturday & Sunday: 11 a.m. - 10 p.m. Happy Hour Monday - Friday: 3 p.m. - 6 p.m. Brunch Buffet Every Sunday: 11 a.m. - 3 p.m. Welcome to The Bower Our covered courtyard bar and dining garden sits just beside the main restaurant. With fire pits, relaxed lounge seating, and a menu of shareable tavern fare, sandwiches, and drinks, The Bower offers a more casual side of Edmund’s Original. We’re walk-in only – no reservations needed – so stop by anytime for happy hour or a laid-back dinner under the open sky. Main content starts here, tab to start navigating Dining Room Slide 1 of 2 Slide 2 of 2 hero gallery paused, press to play images slides Playing hero gallery, press to pause images slides Edmund's Original Main Dining 1081 Morrison Dr., Charleston, SC 29403 1 (843) 727-1145 edmundsoriginal@theindigoroad.com Monday - Friday: 3 p.m. - 10 p.m.Saturday & Sunday: 11 a.m. - 10 p.m. Indoor Dining Hours: Happy Hour (Bar Only) Monday - Friday: 3 p.m. - 6 p.m. Step Inside the Dining Room Where the spirit of the American tavern is reimagined with polish and purpose. This intimate space is warm, storied, and a touch elevated, offering a menu that blends comforting classics with culinary curiosity. Expect thoughtful service, a well-traveled wine list, and an atmosphere that invites you to linger. Reservations recommended. Home Main content starts here, tab to start navigating Slide 1 of 6 Slide 2 of 6 Slide 3 of 6 Slide 4 of 6 Slide 5 of 6 Slide 6 of 6 hero gallery paused, press to play images slides Playing hero gallery, press to pause images slides A Modern Tavern for the Curious Palate. Welcome to Edmund’s Original (Formerly Edmund's Oast) — where Southern hospitality meets thoughtful cooking in a setting built for gathering. Rooted in the spirit of the American tavern, our approach is warm, seasonal, and quietly adventurous. Whether you’re here for a drink with friends or a full-course dinner, you’ll find familiar flavors elevated by a curious hand. The Bower Indoor Dining Events & Private Dining Order Online About the Menu Our menu starts with comfort and ends with a little surprise. We serve American tavern fare inspired by the Lowcountry and lightly touched by flavors from across the world — think layered sauces, bright herbs, and inventive sides. It’s food that feels both classic and new, made to be shared or savored solo. Bower Menu Main Dining Menu About the Bower The courtyard is our sun-drenched hideaway — casual, open, and designed for lingering. With both covered and uncovered seating, cozy fire pits, and garden-style tables, it’s ideal for spontaneous happy hours and laid-back dinners under the Charleston sky. Visit Bower About the Dining Room Inside, the dining room channels the warmth of a timeless tavern — intimate lighting, rich materials, and a touch of polish. Open for dinner only, it’s our more elevated space, perfect for deeper conversations, a bottle shared, and dishes that call for a little extra attention. Visit Dining Room Our Story What began as a neighborhood brewery has evolved into something more A restaurant grounded in tradition but not bound by it. At Edmund’s Original, we celebrate craftsmanship, curiosity, and the joy of a well-cooked meal. We honor the classics, add our own twist, and always leave room for something unexpected. Read Story Reservations We accept reservations for the main dining room. Walk-ins are always welcome both inside and in The Bower. Whether you’re planning a casual happy hour, a long dinner, or something in between — we’d love to host you. Reserve Your Table Pull up a chair — we’ll bring the updates. Sign up to hear about new menus, events, and the occasional off-menu surprise. Join our Mailing List “One of Charleston’s most beloved dining destinations — refined, familiar, and always a little bit unexpected.” – Charleston City Paper Top 10 Unmissable Restaurants in the South - Condé Nast Traveler Reservations Order Online Email Signup Please, enter a valid first name First Name - Required Please, enter a valid last name Last Name - Required Please, enter a valid email Email - Required Submit Please check errors in the form above Thank you for signing up for email updates! Main content starts here, tab to start navigating Private Events Slide 1 of 4 Slide 2 of 4 Slide 3 of 4 Slide 4 of 4 hero gallery paused, press to play images slides Playing hero gallery, press to pause images slides Edmund’s Original represents a unique collection of dining and imbibing experience with a wide range of event spaces to accommodate any group or budget. Each venue represents a passion for high quality with an attention to detail in both service and selection. Inquire Now Main Dining Room With its beautiful high ceilings, comfortable seating and exquisite flourishes, the Main Dining Room is an elegant and versatile space that has something for everyone. The Main Dining Room can comfortably seat 100 guests for a sit-down rehearsal dinner, or we can remove some tables and throw an unforgettable cocktail party for 150 guests. From our open kitchen where you can see our talented chefs hard at work to our bar boasting up to 48 taps and an encyclopedic array of spirits the Main Dining Room offers an elevated experience with no rain plan needed. The Exchange The Exchange is our breathtaking event space that boasts two levels of honeyed pine floors and walls. This exquisite space is perfect for a cocktail party with heavy hors d’oeuvres for up to 80 guests or a dreamy, seated dinner for up to 60 guests. This unique space is sure to have your guests talking about it for years to come. The Entire Restaurant Renting out the entire restaurant includes all rooms available. It allows for rehearsal dinners to have a proper cocktail hour outside before guests come in for dinner. It also allows for up to 300 people to enjoy live music, order drinks at either bar, watch the sun set in the courtyard or even a bourbon bar in the Library room. Perhaps best of all, onsite parking is plentiful. The Library The Library is a completely private, intimate rectangular room near the kitchen of the main dining room. It can seat up to 32 people comfortably and could hold up to 45 people standing. The Library has a wall of windows with velvet curtains that can provide as little or as much privacy as you’d like. The Library is the only event space with a television screen and AV capabilities making it ideal for corporate banquets. This room is the perfect spot for private dinners, happy hours, bridal/baby showers, lectures, wine/beer tastings, and much more. The Bower This open timber-framed structure is the ideal backdrop for a variety of events and parties. Long wooden community tables are available for seated dinners of up to 100 people. The space is also ideal for parties and functions that can overflow in the adjacent courtyard. The entire space allows for up to 200 people standing. The Bower is a super flexible space that can host parties ranging from a corporate happy to a 100 person seated dinner to a lively dance floor. The Bower has fans for summer days and industrial ceiling heaters for the winter evenings. Both sides of The Bower have optional screens for privacy and intimacy. The Bower is complete with a full walkup bar.
